chart_metadata.name: privatebin
chart_metadata.description: PrivateBin is a minimalist, open source online pastebin where the server has zero knowledge of pasted data.

groups.name: Container Image
groups.description: Image to be used for container

groups.name: Networking and Services
groups.description: Configure Network and Services for Container

groups.name: Storage and Persistence
groups.description: Persist and Share Data that is Separate from the Container

groups.name: Resources and Devices
groups.description: Specify Resources/Devices to be Allocated to Workload

attrs.label: Stop All
attrs.description: Stops All Running pods and hibernates cnpg

attrs.label: Replicas (Advanced)
attrs.description: Set the number of Replicas

attrs.label: Extra Environment Variables
attrs.description: Please be aware that some variables are set in the background, adding duplicates here might cause issues or prevent the app from starting...

attrs.label: Show Advanced Settings
attrs.description: Advanced settings are not covered by TrueCharts Support

attrs.label: name
attrs.description: Set a project name to be displayed on the website

attrs.label: basepath
attrs.description: The full URL, with the domain name and directories that point to the PrivateBin files. This URL is essential to allow Opengraph images to be displayed on social networks.

attrs.label: discussion
attrs.description: Enable or disable the discussion feature

attrs.label: opendiscussion
attrs.description: Preselect the discussion feature

attrs.label: password
attrs.description: Enable or disable the password feature

attrs.label: fileupload
attrs.description: Enable or disable the file upload feature

attrs.label: burnafterreadingselected
attrs.description: Preselect the burn-after-reading feature

attrs.label: defaultformatter
attrs.description: Which display mode to preselect by default

attrs.label: syntaxhighlightingtheme
attrs.description: Set a syntax highlighting theme

attrs.label: sizelimit
attrs.description: Size limit per paste or comment in bytes

attrs.label: template
attrs.description: Template to use

attrs.label: info
attrs.description: Info text to display. Use single, instead of double quotes for HTML attributes.

attrs.label: notice
attrs.description: Notice to display

attrs.label: languageselection
attrs.description: By default PrivateBin will guess the visitors language based on the browsers settings. Optionally you can enable the language selection menu, which uses a session cookie to store the choice until the browser is closed.

attrs.label: languagedefault
attrs.description: Set the language your installs defaults to, defaults to English. If this is set and language selection is disabled, this will be the only language.

attrs.label: urlshortener
attrs.description: URL shortener address to offer after a new paste is created. It is suggested to only use this with self-hosted shorteners as this will leak the pastes encryption key.

attrs.label: qrcode
attrs.description: Let users create a QR code for sharing the paste URL with one click. It works both when a new paste is created and when you view a paste.

attrs.label: icon
attrs.description: IP based icons are a weak mechanism to detect if a comment was from. a different user when the same username was used in a comment. It might be used to get the IP of a non anonymous comment poster if the server salt is leaked and a SHA256 HMAC rainbow table is generated for all (relevant) IPs.

attrs.label: cspheader
attrs.description: Content Security Policy headers allow a website to restrict what sources are allowed to be accessed in its context. You need to change this if you added custom scripts from third-party domains to your templates, e.g. tracking scripts or run your site behind certain DDoS-protection services. Check the documentation at https://content-security-policy.com/

attrs.label: zerobincompatibility
attrs.description: Stay compatible with PrivateBin Alpha 0.19, less secure. f enabled will use base64.js version 1.7 instead of 2.1.9 and sha1 instead of sha256 in HMAC for the deletion token.

attrs.label: httpwarning
attrs.description: Enable or disable the warning message when the site is served over an insecure connection (insecure HTTP instead of HTTPS). Secure transport methods like Tor and I2P domains are automatically whitelisted. It is **strongly discouraged** to disable this.

attrs.label: compression
attrs.description: Pick compression algorithm or disable it. Only applies to pastes/comments created after changing the setting.

attrs.label: default
attrs.description: Expire value that is selected per default

attrs.label: limit
attrs.description: Time limit between calls from the same IP address in seconds

attrs.label: exempted
attrs.description: Set IPs addresses (v4 or v6) or subnets (CIDR) which are exempted from the rate-limit. Invalid IPs will be ignored. If multiple values are to be exempted, the list needs to be comma separated. Leave unset to disable exemptions.

attrs.label: creators
attrs.description: If you want only some source IP addresses (v4 or v6) or subnets (CIDR) to be allowed to create pastes, set these here. Invalid IPs will be ignored. If multiple values are to be exempted, the list needs to be comma separated. Leave unset to allow anyone to create pastes.

attrs.label: header
attrs.description: If your website runs behind a reverse proxy or load balancer, set the HTTP header containing the visitors IP address, i.e. X_FORWARDED_FOR

attrs.label: limit
attrs.description: Minimum time limit between two purgings of expired pastes, it is only triggered when pastes are created

attrs.label: batchsize
attrs.description: Maximum amount of expired pastes to delete in one purge. Set this to 0 to disable purging. Set it higher, if you are running a large site.

attrs.label: Main Service
attrs.description: The Primary service on which the healthcheck runs, often the webUI

attrs.label: Service Type
attrs.description: ClusterIP's are only internally available and Loadbalancer exposes the service using the system loadbalancer

attrs.label: LoadBalancer IP
attrs.description: MetalLB Only: Selects the Loadbalancer IP to expose on. Required when using PortalButton with MetalLB

attrs.label: Port
attrs.description: This port exposes the container port on the service

subquestions.description: Add External Interfaces
subquestions.label: Add external Interfaces

attrs.description: Please Specify Host Interface
attrs.label: Host Interface

attrs.description: Define how IP Address will be managed
attrs.label: IP Address Management

attrs.description: Specify type for IPAM
attrs.label: IPAM Type
Service Type
attrs.description: ClusterIP's are only internally available and Loadbalancer exposes the service using the system loadbalancer

attrs.label: LoadBalancer IP
attrs.description: MetalLB Only: Selects the Loadbalancer IP to expose on. Required when using PortalButton with MetalLB

subquestions.label: External IP's
subquestions.description: External IP's

subquestions.label: IP Family Policy
subquestions.description: Specify the IP Policy

subquestions.label: IP Families
subquestions.description: (Advanced) The IP Families that should be used

attrs.label: Target Port
attrs.description: This port exposes the container port on the service

attrs.label: Type of Storage
attrs.description: Sets the persistence type, Anything other than PVC could break rollback!

attrs.label: Automatic Permissions Configuration
attrs.description: Automatically set permissions

subquestions.label: Run CHOWN
subquestions.description: It will run CHOWN on the path with the given fsGroup

subquestions.label: Run CHMOD
subquestions.description:
It will run CHMOD on the path with the given value</br>
Format should be 3 digits, e.g. 770

subquestions.label: Recursive
subquestions.description: It will run CHOWN and CHMOD recursively

attrs.label: Host Path
attrs.description: Path inside the container the storage is mounted

attrs.label: Mount Path
attrs.description: Path inside the container the storage is mounted

attrs.label: storageClass (Advanced)
attrs.description: sets the storageClass to something other than iX default. Only for advanced usecases!

attrs.label: Static Fixed PVC Bindings (Experimental)
attrs.description: Link a PVC to a specific storage location

attrs.label: mode
attrs.description:
disabled: use normal dynamic PVCs
smb: connect to an SMB share
nfs: connect to an NFS share

attrs.label: Server
attrs.description: server to connect to

attrs.label: Share
attrs.description: share to connect to

attrs.label: User
attrs.description: connecting user

attrs.label: Domain
attrs.description: user domain

attrs.label: Password
attrs.description: connecting password

attrs.label: Volume Snapshots (Experimental)
attrs.description: Add an entry to the list to force creation of a volumeSnapshot of this PVC

attrs.label: Name
attrs.description: WARNING: renaming this, means deletion of the snapshot with the old name!

attrs.label: volumeSnapshot Class Name (Advanced)
attrs.description: For use with PVCs using a non-default storageClass

subquestions.label: Cert-Manager clusterIssuer
subquestions.description: add the name of your cert-manager clusterIssuer here for automatic tls certificates. Cannot be used combined with tls option below

subquestions.label: Traefik Middlewares
subquestions.description: Add previously created Traefik Middlewares to this Ingress

subquestions.label: Integrations
subquestions.description: Connect ingress with other charts

attrs.description: Connect ingress with Homepage

attrs.label: Name
attrs.description: defaults to chartname

attrs.label: Description
attrs.description: defaults to chart description

subquestions.label: Show Advanced Settings
subquestions.description: Advanced settings are not covered by TrueCharts Support

subquestions.label: (Advanced) Traefik Entrypoint
subquestions.description: Entrypoint used by Traefik when using Traefik as Ingress Provider

attrs.description: add the name of your cert-manager clusterIssuer here for automatic tls certificates.

attrs.label: Cluster Certificate (Advanced)
attrs.description: Add the name of your cluster-wide certificate, that you set up in the ClusterIssuer chart.

attrs.label: certificateIssuer
attrs.description: add the name of your cert-manager clusterIssuer here for automatic tls certificates. Cannot be used combined with tls option below

attrs.label: Use Cert-Manager clusterIssuer
attrs.description: add the name of your Cert-Manager clusterIssuer here for automatic tls certificates.

attrs.label: Cluster Certificate (Advanced)
attrs.description: Add the name of your cluster-wide certificate, that you set up in the ClusterIssuer chart.

attrs.description: Connect ingress with Homepage

attrs.label: Name
attrs.description: defaults to chartname

attrs.description: defaults to chart description

attrs.description: Entrypoint used by Traefik when using Traefik as Ingress Provider

attrs.description: Add previously created Traefik Middlewares to this Ingress

attrs.label: runAsUser
attrs.description: The UserID of the user running the application

attrs.label: runAsGroup
attrs.description: The groupID of the user running the application

attrs.label: Process User ID - PUID
attrs.description: When supported by the container, this sets the User ID running the Application Process. Not supported by all Apps

attrs.label: UMASK
attrs.description: When supported by the container, this sets the UMASK for the App. Not supported by all Apps

attrs.label: Show Advanced Settings
attrs.description: Advanced settings are not covered by TrueCharts Support

attrs.label: fsGroup
attrs.description: The group that should own ALL storage.

attrs.label: CPU
attrs.description: 1000m means 1 hyperthread. Detailed info: https://truecharts.org/manual/SCALE/validation

attrs.label: RAM
attrs.description: 1Gi means 1 Gibibyte RAM. Detailed info: https://truecharts.org/manual/SCALE/validation

attrs.label: CPU
attrs.description: 1000m means 1 hyperthread. Detailed info: https://truecharts.org/manual/SCALE/validation

attrs.label: RAM
attrs.description: 1Gi means 1 Gibibyte RAM. Detailed info: https://truecharts.org/manual/SCALE/validation

attrs.label: (Advanced) Type of Storage
attrs.description: Sets the persistence type

attrs.label: Host Device Path
attrs.description: Path to the device on the host system

attrs.label: Container Device Path
attrs.description: Path inside the container the device is mounted

attrs.label: Service Type
attrs.description: ClusterIP's are only internally available and Loadbalancer exposes the service using the system loadbalancer

attrs.label: LoadBalancer IP
attrs.description: MetalLB Only: Selects the Loadbalancer IP to expose on. Required when using PortalButton with MetalLB

subquestions.label: Cert-Manager clusterIssuer
subquestions.description: add the name of your cert-manager clusterIssuer here for automatic tls certificates. Cannot be used combined with tls option below

attrs.label: Use Cert-Manager clusterIssuer
attrs.description: add the name of your cert-manager clusterIssuer here for automatic tls certificates.

attrs.label: Cluster Certificate (Advanced)
attrs.description: Add the name of your cluster-wide certificate, that you set up in the ClusterIssuer chart.

attrs.label: Authentication Username (Optional)
attrs.description: Authentication Username, Optional

attrs.label: Authentication Password
attrs.description: Authentication Credentials

attrs.label: Authentication Key
attrs.description: Provide an auth key to automatically authenticate the node as your user account.

attrs.label: Auth Once
attrs.description: Only attempt to log in if not already logged in.

attrs.label: Accept DNS
attrs.description: Accept DNS configuration from the admin console.

attrs.label: Userspace
attrs.description: Userspace Networking mode allows running Tailscale where you do not have access to create a VPN tunnel device.

attrs.label: Routes
attrs.description: Expose physical subnet routes to your entire Tailscale network.

attrs.label: Destination IP
attrs.description: Tells the DNAT mechanism which Destination IP to set in the IP header, and where to send packets that are matched.

attrs.label: Sock5 Server
attrs.description: The address on which to listen for SOCKS5 proxying into the tailscale net.

attrs.label: Outbound HTTP Proxy Listen
attrs.description: The address on which to listen for HTTP proxying into the tailscale net.

attrs.label: Extra Args
attrs.description: Extra Args

attrs.label: Tailscale Daemon Extra Args
attrs.description: Tailscale Daemon Extra Args

attrs.label: Killswitch Excluded IPv4 networks
attrs.description: List of Killswitch Excluded IPv4 Addresses

attrs.label: Killswitch Excluded IPv6 networks
attrs.description: List of Killswitch Excluded IPv6 Addresses

questions.label: Please read the documentation at https://truecharts.org
Please consider supporting TrueCharts, see https://truecharts.org/sponsor

4.0.0.app_readme:
PrivateBin is a minimalist, open source online pastebin where the server has zero knowledge of pasted data.

This App is supplied by TrueCharts, for more information visit the manual: https://truecharts.org/charts/incubator/privatebin

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!
4.0.0.detailed_readme:
README

General Info

TrueCharts can be installed as both normal Helm Charts or as Apps on TrueNAS SCALE. However only installations using the TrueNAS SCALE Apps system are supported.

For more information about this App, please check the docs on the TrueCharts website

This chart is not maintained by the upstream project and any issues with the chart should be raised here

Support

  • Please check our quick-start guides for TrueNAS SCALE.
  • See the Website
  • Check our Discord
  • Open a issue

Sponsor TrueCharts

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!

All Rights Reserved - The TrueCharts Project
4.0.0.changelog:
Important: for the complete changelog, please refer to the website

privatebin-3.0.33 (2023-12-06)

privatebin-3.0.33 (2023-12-06)

privatebin-3.0.33 (2023-12-06)

privatebin-3.0.32 (2023-12-03)

Chore

  • bump everything to ensure catalog has latest versions

privatebin-3.0.31 (2023-12-02)

Chore

  • fix annotations again
  • update annotations
  • cleanup chart.yaml and add min-max scale version
  • Fix typo in categories and make them singular (#13693)

### Fix

  • ensure all questions.yaml can be rendered (#15612)

privatebin-4.0.0 (2023-07-31)

Feat

  • hide advanced ingress options behind checbox (#9203)

### Fix

  • fix mistakes on questions.yaml

privatebin-3.0.30 (2023-04-29)

Chore

  • update container image tccr.io/truecharts/privatebin to 1.5.1 (#8347)

privatebin-3.0.29 (2023-02-27)

Chore

  • update helm general non-major (#7725)

privatebin-3.0.28 (2023-02-26)

Chore

  • update container image tccr.io/truecharts/privatebin to 1.5.1

privatebin-3.0.27 (2023-02-19)

Chore

attrs.label: Authentication Password
attrs.description: Authentication Credentials

attrs.label: Authentication Key
attrs.description: Provide an auth key to automatically authenticate the node as your user account.

attrs.label: Auth Once
attrs.description: Only attempt to log in if not already logged in.

attrs.label: Accept DNS
attrs.description: Accept DNS configuration from the admin console.

attrs.label: Userspace
attrs.description: Userspace Networking mode allows running Tailscale where you do not have access to create a VPN tunnel device.

attrs.label: Routes
attrs.description: Expose physical subnet routes to your entire Tailscale network.

attrs.label: Destination IP
attrs.description: Tells the DNAT mechanism which Destination IP to set in the IP header, and where to send packets that are matched.

attrs.label: Sock5 Server
attrs.description: The address on which to listen for SOCKS5 proxying into the tailscale net.

attrs.label: Outbound HTTP Proxy Listen
attrs.description: The address on which to listen for HTTP proxying into the tailscale net.

attrs.label: Extra Args
attrs.description: Extra Args

attrs.label: Tailscale Daemon Extra Args
attrs.description: Tailscale Daemon Extra Args

attrs.description: List of Killswitch Excluded IPv4 Addresses

attrs.description: List of Killswitch Excluded IPv6 Addresses

3.0.33.app_readme:
PrivateBin is a minimalist, open source online pastebin where the server has zero knowledge of pasted data.

This App is supplied by TrueCharts, for more information visit the manual: https://truecharts.org/charts/incubator/privatebin

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!
3.0.33.detailed_readme:
README

General Info

TrueCharts can be installed as both normal Helm Charts or as Apps on TrueNAS SCALE. However only installations using the TrueNAS SCALE Apps system are supported.

For more information about this App, please check the docs on the TrueCharts website

This chart is not maintained by the upstream project and any issues with the chart should be raised here

Support

  • Please check our quick-start guides for TrueNAS SCALE.
  • See the Website
  • Check our Discord
  • Open a issue

Sponsor TrueCharts

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!

All Rights Reserved - The TrueCharts Project
